diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,127 @@
+FROM ubuntu
+
+LABEL maintainer="Clayne Robison<clayne.b.robison@intel.com>"
+
+# It is possible to override these for releases.
+ARG TF_BRANCH=r1.4
body: Do you mean pulling from latest? Looking at the tag structure, I think I understand: this file is the base and should pull FROM latest-devel; the whl only version should pull FROM latest. Release versions then have subsequent tags: 1.4.0, and 1.4.0-devel.
